pages.text: $(li)The Lock is an item which can be used to lock $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chests$(/l).$(br)$(li)To use, you only have to rename it in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l), then right click to the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) while you are holding the Lock in your hand.

$(li)A locked $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) can only be opened using an item which has the same name as the lock.$(br)$(li)For example, a lock named Password requires a key named Password.
$(li)A lock can be removed by shift right clicking on the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) with a Key that has the same name as the lock.
